title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as a chat, LLM, or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat, model management, multimodal, RAG, user auth, & plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs, streaming, and Android support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: chatbox-ai
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat client that supports Ollama, OpenAI, Claude, etc.

title: ollama-copilot-vscode
summary: VS-Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding copilot.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple Ruby gem that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick shell scripting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by the community; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and minimal dependencies.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React-based web UI for chatting with Ollama models; runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo tracking community SDKs for Go, Rust, Swift, C#, Java, and more.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library generated from the OpenAPI spec; mirrors Python/JS features.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for Ollama.

title: ollama-rfcs
summary: Public RFC repo where the Ollama team discusses upcoming features and breaking changes.
